solution_line_template: He ordered {num_pizzas} pizzas, each cut into {slices_per_pizza} slices so that’s {num_pizzas}*{slices_per_pizza} = <<{num_pizzas}*{slices_per_pizza}={total_slices}>>{total_slices} slices

Stephen ate {stephen_ate_percent_num}% of the pizza so he ate {stephen_ate_percent_decimal}*{total_slices} = <<{stephen_ate_percent_num}*{percent_factor}*{total_slices}={stephen_slices_eaten}>>{stephen_slices_eaten} slices

{slices_after_stephen} slices are left and Pete eats {pete_ate_percent_num}% of {slices_after_stephen} slices so he eats {slices_after_stephen}*{pete_ate_percent_decimal} = <<{slices_after_stephen}*{pete_ate_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={pete_slices_eaten}>>{pete_slices_eaten} slices

If there were {slices_after_stephen} slices and Pete ate {pete_slices_eaten} slices then there are {slices_after_stephen}-{pete_slices_eaten} = <<{slices_after_stephen}-{pete_slices_eaten}={slices_left_over}>>{slices_left_over} slices left over
